name: Blade's Honor
description:
Blade's Honor is my submission for the Wowie Game Jam 3.0.

Experience the way of the samurai in this fast-paced reflex game!

Will you perish by your foe's blade? More importantly, will it be with honor?

The theme of this jam is "Failure is progress". So I decided to add an honor mechanic that works like this: if you die with honor (aka by dying along with your enemy), you don't lose, and you advance to the next difficulty. And if you kill the enemy without dying, you lose an honor point.
